attributes.additional_details:
Stop wasting public money and start supporting the people of the UK.
If you asked the people of the UK  if spending public money for yourselves your second homes holidays expensive wall paper dining out ect was ok you'd see the biggest backlash in history that this is not acceptable especially when you leave the elderly to suffer and now the disabled and sen children.
attributes.background:

The government are on a very high wage as it is.
You've taken away support for the elderly to heat their homes yet you still claim for yourselves.
You shouldn't be allowed to use public money for yourselves or your second homes privet jets ect

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
